repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
This PR add a pyx file tracer and reporter can work without c or cpp files for tools like cmake or meson.

Current we parse pyx code from generated c files which is unnecessary, we can just parse them from pyx file itself.

I think it's possible to remove old tracer and reporter with this tracer only.

This maybe the final piece of https://github.com/cython/cython/issues/6186 (cc @oscarbenjamin)

This is an immature implement and still have something to fix, but I want to create a PR first to have some discussion.
